videos.headline: South Carolina scores with QB keeper
videos.description: Jake Bentley moves quickly out of the pocket and jukes out a defender to score from 19 yards away.

videos.headline: Gamecocks soar for the rushing TD
videos.description: A.J. Turner plays leap frog with the offensive line and dives in for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Vandy's Lipscomb makes incredible one-handed catch
videos.description: Kyle Shurmur lobs it up to Kalija Lipscomb who somehow controls it with one hand and pins it against his helmet while keeping one foot in bounds.

videos.headline: Commodores cap off long drive with passing TD
videos.description: C.J. Duncan crosses across the goal-line and grabs the laser pass from Kyle Shurmur for the touchdown.

videos.headline: South Carolina scores on 36-yard passing TD
videos.description: Jake Bentley throws a perfect ball to Shi Smith who's streaking on the sideline and jogs in for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Commodores air it out and come down with TD
videos.description: Kyle Shurmur loads up and launches a pass to the end zone where Kalija Lipscomb is waiting to come down with the catch for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Gamecocks have second QB keeper TD
videos.description: Jake Bentley uses his legs to go around the outside and score for the second time this game.

videos.headline: Right place, right time for Vandy
videos.description: The pass from Kyle Shurmur was deflected not once, but twice before Caleb Scott was there to dive underneath and save the catch.

videos.headline: Shurmur throws 4th TD pass
videos.description: Kyle Shurmur and C.J. Duncan connect for a touchdown for the second time in the game which brings Vanderbilt to within 7.

videos.headline: Muschamp proud of the tough victory against Vandy
videos.description: South Carolina head coach Will Muschamp praises his team for the gutsy win and looks forward to a big matchup next week against Georgia.

videos.headline: Jake Bentley will do 'whatever it takes' to win
videos.description: Gamecocks QB Jake Bentley talks about his two rushing touchdowns and the hard-fought 34-27 win over the Commodores.

videos.headline: Gamecocks win in a QB showdown
videos.description: Taylor Zarzour and Andre Ware discuss what it took for South Carolina to take down Vanderbilt.
